column1: Mowgli lives in the """Man-Village""" with the girl who lured him in
column5: Mowgli wants to return to the chaotic adventures of the jungle
column6: and after nearly leading the other children in the village into the jungle
column7: is punished by his adopted father for putting them in danger. Meanwhile
column9: Shere Khan has returned to Baloo and Bagheera's part of the jungle
column10: seeking revenge on Mowgli for humiliating him. Baloo enters the Man-Village and persuades Mowgli to come back into the jungle; however
column12: Shere Khan has followed Baloo into the village
column13: only to be chased off by the villagers. In the ensuing battle
column14: Shanti and Ranjan sneak into the jungle to rescue Mowgli
column15: believing that Baloo is a rabid animal who has kidnapped him. Bagheera learns of Mowgli's escape from the village when the humans search the jungle for him
column16: and immediately accuses Baloo. Mowgli instructs Baloo to scare off Shanti should she appear
column17: and bemoans about his minutiae life in the Man-Village. Baloo and Mowgli journey to King Louie's old temple (King Louie is mentioned to have moved out)
column19: when the animals of the jungle mock Shanti and other aspects of Mowgli's life in the Man-Village
column20: Mowgli angrily leaves. He finds Shanti and Ranjan
column21: but Baloo scares Shanti. When the truth comes out that Mowgli ordered Baloo to scare her
column23: abandoning Mowgli. Baloo realizes that Mowgli misses his old life
column24: but when Mowgli tries to make amends with his human friends
column25: they are cornered by Shere Khan. The tiger chases Mowgli and Shanti to an abandoned temple built above a lake of lava. Baloo instructs Bagheera to protect Ranjan while he goes to save Mowgli and Shanti. After confusing Shere Khan by banging several different gongs
column26: Shanti's presence is revealed to Shere Khan. Baloo tackles Shere Khan to the ground
column27: allowing Mowgli and Shanti enough time to escape
column28: but the tiger chases them to a statue across a pit of lava. Shere Khan is trapped within the statue's mouth
column29: and it plummets onto a large stone that resides in the lava below. With his nemesis finally defeated
column30: Mowgli returns to the Man-Village with Shanti and Ranjan. Ranjan's father apologises to Mowgli for failing to understand that the jungle was part of who he was. The children return to visit Baloo and Bagheera in the jungle on a daily basis.
